message.body: I don't know if you know that Phin yelled at me last night and them he, Jesse and I were all fighting, but we made up. Kinda sucked. Oh well. How am I gonna run into that beautiful drummer? Hehe ;) I think everyone is a little in love with him
O my! I wasnt aware. You can come to dobra on a tues at 630 and run into him playing with Grup Anwar ;-)
That would be stalking, but this Tuesday is my only one off before simmer classes and I've always wanted to see you play there
I'm really glad to hear that you didn't notice. It upset some people a lot and brought morale down. It was a very sad feeling
Thanks for being the youngest and most professional one of us!!! Haha
